options.explicitMark: Please mark your artwork as explicit if it contains explicit content. Artwork that is not properly marked as explicit and is found to contain explicit content will be removed.
options.goreMark: Please mark your artwork as containing sensitive themes if it includes elements such as blood, disturbing content, or similar elements. This will help to ensure that viewers are aware of the potentially sensitive nature of the artwork and can make informed decisions about whether to view it.
options.originalCharacterMark: Mark your artwork as featuring original characters if the characters depicted in the artwork were created by you. If the characters depicted in the artwork are someone else's or are from an animation series, do not check this option.
options.allowRedrawMark: Mark this option if you give permission for other artists to redraw or remix your artwork and submit their own versions. Checking this option will enable the redraw button, allowing other artists to use your artwork as inspiration and submit their own versions.
options.redrawOwnStyleMark: Mark this option if you are using your own drawing style to redraw the art.

title: Title
tagsInputPlaceholder: Tags (Press enter or comma to add new tag)
tosContent:
1. Introduction

Welcome to our social community platform for Artists where they can share their artworks. The following terms and conditions (the "Terms of Service") govern your access to and use of our platform, as well as the content, features, and services offered through the platform. By using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Content Guidelines

Our platform is a community of artists, and we want to maintain a friendly and supportive environment. We do not tolerate hate speech, bullying, or discrimination based on race, ethnicity, or any other personal characteristic. Users must respect each other's creations and not criticize or demean another artist's work based on their personal beliefs or characteristics. We do not allow political discussions on our platform.

We do allow explicit and gore content to be uploaded to our platform, but artists must mark their content as such, and users can choose to filter out such content if they do not wish to see it.

Go to our Content Guidelines for more info.

3. Account Security

To ensure the security of our users' accounts, we use a passphrase for account recovery. This passphrase is stored in the profile security settings. In the event that a user forgets their passphrase, they can reach out to us via our Twitter or Instagram accounts. We will ask some verification questions before the user can recover their account. To recover their account, the user must provide their username, email address, and the passphrase.

4. Use of Our Services

Our platform is designed to provide a seamless and enjoyable experience for personal use. We take great care to ensure that our users have access to a wide range of features and services that meet their individual needs. However, it is important to note that our platform is not intended for use by third parties or individuals outside of our platform without express permission.

We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users, and allowing unauthorized access to our platform could compromise these fundamental values. This includes using our API or scraping content from our platform, which can undermine the integrity of our services and disrupt the user experience.

To maintain the integrity and security of our platform, we require that all users obtain our express permission before using our services for any commercial, non-personal, or other unauthorized purposes. We reserve the right to take appropriate legal action against those who violate these terms.

We believe that our platform provides immense value to our users and we are proud to offer it to the public for personal use. However, we also recognize the importance of safeguarding our services and preventing unauthorized use.

5. Payment

Most of our features are free. However, users can upgrade their profile to a PRO version for additional features. By upgrading to the PRO version, users accept the tax and the price of the PRO version, which may change from time to time. We do not allow refunds for the PRO version.

6. Ownership

We understand that the content uploaded by our users is their intellectual property. Therefore, we do not claim any ownership or intellectual property rights over the content uploaded by our users.

We respect the rights of artists and creators, and we believe that the content they upload belongs exclusively to them. We strive to ensure that our platform provides a safe and secure environment for creators to share and showcase their work without any undue restrictions or limitations.

We also take the privacy and security of our users seriously. We understand that uploading content to our platform can be a personal and sensitive process, and we take every precaution to ensure that our users' content is protected and secure.

7. Account Termination

To ensure that our platform provides a safe and secure environment for all users, we have established clear guidelines and rules of conduct. If a user violates any of our rules or if we suspect that the user is not using our platform in accordance with our Terms of Service, we reserve the right to terminate their account.

We take the protection of our users and our platform seriously, and we will take swift action to address any violations of our rules or any behavior that threatens the safety and security of our community.

In the event that a user decides to close their account, all of their artwork and comments will be permanently removed from our platform. Please note that once an account is closed, it cannot be recovered, and the user will not be able to access their content or account information.

8. User Data

To prevent the upload of AI-generated content and maintain the integrity of our platform, we may record certain information from users who upload artwork, including the IP address, user agent, and HWID of the device used to upload the content. This information is used solely for the purpose of preventing spam and enforcing our policies around AI-generated content.

We take the privacy and security of our users' data seriously, and we assure you that any data collected will be stored securely and encrypted. We will not share this data with any third parties.

By uploading your artwork to our platform, you agree to the collection and use of this data for the purposes outlined in this policy. If you have any concerns about the collection or use of this data, please contact our support team for more information.

We believe that protecting the integrity of our platform is essential to maintaining a safe and supportive environment for our community of artists and creators. We appreciate your understanding and support in helping us to achieve this goal.

9. Use of Artwork on Other Platforms

By uploading your artwork to our platform, you agree to allow us to showcase your artwork on our social media channels, including but not limited to Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. We may use your artwork to promote our platform or to showcase the work of our talented community of artists.

We will always give proper credit to the artist by including a link to the artwork on our platform and providing a link to the artist's profile. We understand that the rights of artists and creators are of utmost importance, and we will always strive to protect those rights while promoting the work of our community.

Please note that if you do not wish for your artwork to be shared on our social media channels, you may choose to opt out of this feature by contacting our support team. We respect the wishes of our users and will work with you to ensure that your artwork is used in a way that aligns with your preferences.

We believe that sharing the work of our community on social media channels is a great way to promote the creativity and talent of our users, and we appreciate your support in helping us to achieve this goal.

10. Artificial Intelligence (AI)

We are committed to fostering a community of artists and creators who share their unique vision and perspective with the world. As part of this commitment, we do not allow and will never permit any AI-generated content on our platform.

This includes all forms of AI-generated art, deepfakes, and any other content that is generated or modified by AI. We believe that true creativity and artistic expression can only come from human imagination and experience, and we strive to provide a platform that celebrates and supports human creativity.

To maintain the integrity of our platform and protect the rights of our users, we have implemented strict guidelines and controls to prevent the upload of any AI-generated content. Any user found to be uploading such content will be immediately terminated from our platform, and their content will be removed.

We believe that our platform offers a unique opportunity for artists and creators to share their work with a global audience, and we are committed to providing a safe and supportive environment for all users. We welcome feedback from our community and will continue to explore new ways to enhance our platform and support the creativity of our users.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.content:
• Do not post artwork that you do not own or create yourself, even if you have permission from the original artist. This is to ensure fair engagement and recognition for all artists in the community. If you wish to redraw someone else's artwork, you may use the "artwork redraw" feature and submit a redrawn version with the permission of the original artist.
  • Keep the content on topic. Do not post photographs, crafts, or tattoo art that are not related to the theme of the forum or community.
  • Do not post art images created using artificial intelligence (AI) tools. If you come across any AI-generated images, please report them to the moderators immediately. AI-generated art can be identified by certain characteristics such as improperly drawn hands, unnatural postures, strange coloring, unnatural shadows, and repetitive poses. You can also recognize AI-generated art by comparing it to the artist's other work or by inconsistencies in their art style.
  • Do not advertise or promote AI tools or services on the forum or community. Bring back the purity of art community!
  • Do not spam tags in order to gain more views.
  • If your artwork contains explicit, mature, or adult content, you must include an explicit filter on the submission.
  • If your artwork contains blood, gore, or other disturbing elements, you must include a gore filter on the submission.
  • Do not post artwork that threatens or promotes terrorism.
  • Do not post anything related to politics or promote political views in any way.
  • Do not include scam or phishing links in the description of your artwork.

If you come across any artwork that breaks these rules, please use the report button to notify the moderators. We will investigate the issue as soon as possible and take appropriate action to maintain the quality, relevance, and respect of the community. We appreciate your help in keeping our community a positive and enjoyable place for all artists.

By submitting your artwork to Upy, you agree that we may use your artwork to display on our other social media platforms, such as Instagram or Facebook.

By reading these guidelines, you agree that your artwork may be taken down and your account may be suspended or permanently removed if you break one or more of these rules. We take the quality and integrity of our community seriously, and we will not tolerate behavior that goes against these guidelines.
